name: MicroCrawl
description:
Microcrawl is a bite sized point and click 2D adventure text hybrid presented from the first person in which you'll have to navigate your way through a dark fantasy world to get back home.

A Retro Dark Fantasy Narrative


A love letter to retro adventure games packed into a compact experience. No pixel hunting and no moon logic.

A handcrafted dark fantasy dream world drawn pixel by pixel


Capturing the feeling of the Commodore 64, in an accessible package

Explore a narrative driven tale of broken characters.


As you try to find your way home learn the story of the others who became trapped before you.

Dead City: A Whole New Adventure Included To Celebrate The Steam Release


We're proud to be able to have finished an entire new campaign in time for the official steam release. In 'Dead City' you will have to put the catacombs to rest by solving more difficult puzzles than are in the main adventure.
